# this is index.html file GitHub Actions Deployment Workflow

GitHub Actions Deployment Workflow

Introduction

This document outlines the deployment workflow for GitHub Actions.

Workflow Steps

  1. Set up the repository.
  2. Create a workflow file in the `.github/workflows` directory.
  3. Define the necessary jobs and steps.
  4. Test the workflow.
  5. Deploy to production.
